errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that the package is only supported on Python 3.8, while it also supports Python 3.9.
correction_candidates: This package is supported in python 3.8 and later.
This package is supported in python > 3.7
This package is supported in python 3.8 and 3.9
This package is supported in python 3
errors.golden_answer: This package is supported in python 3.8 and 3.9

errors.error_description: The command `pip install pysiaf` is incorrect for installing from a local clone; it will install the version from PyPI instead of the local code. The correct command is `pip install .`.
